title: Howard Capital Management Inc . Increases Holdings in Advanced Micro Devices , Inc . $AMD
description: Read Howard Capital Management Inc. Increases Holdings in Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. $AMD at Ticker Report, Howard Capital Management Inc. lifted its holdings in shares of Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD – Free Report) by 15.1% during the third quarter, HoldingsChannel reports. The firm owned 81,573 shares of the semiconductor manufacturer’s stock after purchasing an additional 10,680 shares during the quarter. Howard Capital Management Inc.’s holdings in Advanced Micro Devices were […]
